snippet: The Compañía Rafaela Carrasco reinterpreted songs recorded by García Lorca in Flamenco Festival 2012.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by Compania Rafaela Carrasco, part of the Flamenco Festival of 2012, at City Center.
lead_paragraph: The Compañía Rafaela Carrasco reinterpreted songs recorded by García Lorca in Flamenco Festival 2012.

headline.seo: Compañía Rafaela Carrasco at Flamenco Festival 2012
headline.main: García Lorca’s Favorites Enliven Flamenco’s World
headline.print_headline: García Lorca’s Favorites Enliven Flamenco’s World
